column4: Anyone know how to make a multi-page pdf text-readable via the command line? :)
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pdftotext
i've used a related tool, pdftohtml, it worked okay
Yeah I just need to make it text readable. Does it convert it to another format? It has to stay in pdf when I'm done. :3
i don't think there is utility that can just 'read' it on the fly and keep it as it is
but you'll get the pdf then it's text form as 2 different files, that's how it was with pdftohtml
ok, so it outputed the text as a text file, how would I layer the text then on the pdf? :)
Thank you for helping me!^-^
what do you mean 'layer the text'?
Ok, for example, when you have a PDF file, you want to be able to select or highlight text. So you have to use OCR or some other way to recognize text and it layers it on top of the pdf file.
